messages.subject: New to the group
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings from sunny Socal. My name is Heidi . I have 2 children son 7 daughter 10. I have been on my homeschooling journey for 5 years now , and I am being
messages.messageBody:
Greetings from sunny Socal. My name is Heidi . I have 2 children son 7
daughter 10. I have been on my homeschooling journey for 5 years now ,
and I am being led evermore in this direction. I hope to gain from all
and eventually share with all.

Blessings, Heidi



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: New to the group
messages.msgSnippet: My name is Lesa (some of you know me from unschoolbasics yahoo group). I m married to Rick (we ve been together since High School... almost 15 years) and we
messages.messageBody:
My name is Lesa (some of you know me from unschoolbasics yahoo group).
I'm married to Rick (we've been together since High School... almost
15 years) and we have one awesome daughter, Dayle (she just turned 10).

I'm expanding my scope of unschooling support... I may lurk more than
I post.

thanks

Lesa
http://lifeacademy.homeschooljournal.net

messages.subject: Re: New to the group
messages.msgSnippet: ... learning ... months, and ... to attend ... exciting ... right ... know ... Hello and welcome Dominique. My best childhood friend is named Dominique also.
messages.messageBody:
--- In AlwaysLearning@y..., "Dominique Moseley"
<dominique@b...> wrote:
> We are also new to the group. We live in California, and are
learning
> at home with our children Constanze 4, Robert 3, Gabrielle 7
months, and
> Wesley 2 weeks.
> We recently attended a homeschooling conference where I got
to attend
> Sandra's seminar on the practicalities of unschooling. It was
exciting
> to hear someone put into words what we always new was the
right
> educational direction for our family. I look forward to getting to
know
> all of you.
>
> Dominique


Hello and welcome Dominique.
My best childhood friend is named Dominique also. I also
attended the conference and Sandra's seminar (wasn't it
brilliant!?) and I'm also in CA.

Meghan

messages.subject: RE: [AlwaysLearning] New to the group
messages.msgSnippet: We are also new to the group.  We live in California, and are learning at home with our children Constanze 4, Robert 3, Gabrielle 7 months, and Wesley 2 weeks.
messages.messageBody:
We are also new to the group. We live in California, and are learning
at home with our children Constanze 4, Robert 3, Gabrielle 7 months, and
Wesley 2 weeks.
We recently attended a homeschooling conference where I got to attend
Sandra's seminar on the practicalities of unschooling. It was exciting
to hear someone put into words what we always new was the right
educational direction for our family. I look forward to getting to know
all of you.

Dominique






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Hi! I'm Kim, mother to Brittany 16, Mellissa 14, Trey 8, Ashlynn-Layne 4, and Grayson Montgomery 8 months.

We are living in Florida and homeschool.

Can't wait to get to know you all better!

=)
